original_title: UFC on Fox 24: Johnson vs. Reis
overview: UFC on Fox 24: Johnson vs. Reis was a mixed martial arts event produced by the Ultimate Fighting Championship held on April 15, 2017, at the Sprint Center in Kansas City, Missouri. A UFC Flyweight Championship match between current champion Demetrious Johnson and Wilson Reis headlined this event.
title: UFC on Fox 24: Johnson vs. Reis
